resources.string: A convenient web client for the massive multiplayer online game Pardus, offering fast and secure access to your account.

Important: To save screen space the Pardus menu and message frames have been removed. You can access the Pardus menu by scrolling against the top or bottom of a page or by using the App\'s menu. The items in the Pardus menu can be configured, new links can be added.\nNotifications about new status messages and logs now appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.\nMore info about the changes can be found in the market.
